nodes.text: Anavus Svag was a Jedi Guardian during the events that surrounded the Great Hyperspace War, when the Sith Empire made their thrust for domination of the Galactic Republic.

As a Jedi Guardian, Anavus was an expert on tactics, weapons, armor, and vehicles used in combat during his time. His weapon of choice was not a lightsaber, but rather a lightstaff imbued with the Force, whose ends both glowed with a resonant blue energy signature. Eventually, he recorded all his military expertise into a holocron so that future Jedi could learn from his experiences. Always answering Jedi's questions tersely and in an efficient manner, he left the level of detail of his answers to be decided by the holocron's gatekeeper.
Odan-Urr used Anavus' information about the Great Hyperspace War, when making a record to the Tedryn Holocron.
